short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crypto Shielder protects you from bad javascript injections.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crypto Shielder monitors your clipboard for any malicious changes. 

Clipboard hijackers can discreetly change your saved Cryptocurrency addresses and swap it with a malicious one.

If there has been a third-party breach of your Clipboard, Crypto Shielder will notify you immediately!
